title: EkAmranAthAya namastE EkAnEka
sahitya:
EkAmranAthAya namastE EkAnEka phaladAya


anupallavi

 pAkashAsanAdi dEva vanditAya varadAyamUka mukhya vAkpradAya mUlakanda muktidAya


caraNam   kAmAkSI mOhitAya kAmita phalada nipuNAya kumAra guruguhAtmajAya karavidhrta kurangAya 
kamajanaka pUjitAya kamanIya kandharAya kAncIpuri vilasitAya kali kalmaSa vinAshAya
